metadata.synopsis: Gale follows up on previous purification discussion. What is this device, exactly? Lae'zel says she can say no more, by covenant.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: That zaith'isk you mentioned intrigues me. Care to tell me a bit more?

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: An intricate device, crafted by mlar - our most gifted artisans. I am sworn to say no more.
